mapper.select: SELECT a.PERSON_ID, a.P_NAME, a.AGE, a.INFO, a.DEPT_ID, a.JOB_ID, a.JOB_NAME, b.DEPT_NAME FROM (SELECT p.`PERSON_ID`, p.`P_NAME`, p.`AGE`, p.`INFO`, p.`DEPT_ID`, p.`JOB_ID`, j.`JOB_NAME` FROM person p LEFT JOIN job j ON p.`JOB_ID` = j.`JOB_ID`) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT p.PERSON_ID, d.`DEPT_ID`, d.`DEPT_NAME` FROM person p LEFT JOIN dept d ON p.`DEPT_ID` = d.`DEPT_ID`) b ON a.PERSON_ID = b.PERSON_ID

a.PERSON_ID = #{id}
